items.name: Torment Thresher
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Socketed Gems
15% increased Attack Speed
+31% to Lightning Resistance
Gain 3 Life per Enemy Killed

properties.name: Attack, AoE, Movement, Channelling, Physical, Melee

socketedItems.secDescrText: Channel this skill to move towards a targeted location while spinning, building up stages while constantly attacking enemies in an area around you. While channelling this skill, you cannot be knocked back.
explicitMods: 30 to 45 Added Attack Physical Damage
10% increased Area of Effect
8% increased Area of Effect per 0.1 metre additional Melee Strike Range
30% less Movement Speed
First Hit deals 50% less Damage
Gains 1 Stage every 0.1 seconds while Channelling
Maximum 7 Stages
+0.1 metres to radius per Stage
Lose 1 Stage every 0.3 seconds while not Channelling
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Must support both a channelling skill and a non-channelling spell skill to work. The channelling skill will trigger a spell periodically while channelling. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: Supported Triggered Spells deal 30% less Damage
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger a Supported Spell every 0.45 seconds while Channelling Supported Skills
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a portal to the current area's town.
explicitMods: 60% increased Cast Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports melee strike skills, causing their melee strike to deal splash damage around each target hit.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal Splash Damage to surrounding targets
Supported Skills deal 38% less Damage to surrounding targets
Supported Skills have 66% more Melee Splash Area of Effect

items.name: Perseverance
explicitMods: 8% increased maximum Life
+35% to Cold Resistance
1% increased Attack Damage per 200 of the lowest of Armour and Evasion Rating
Melee Hits which Stun Fortify
You have Onslaught while Fortified
flavourText: "Some blows must be evaded. Some blows must be endured.
The trick is to tell them apart."

properties.name: Attack, Projectile, Melee, Strike, Fire, Cold, Lightning, AoE, Prismatic, Bow

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each attack with this skill will choose an element at random, and will only be able to deal damage of that element. If the attack hits an enemy, it will also deal damage in an area around them, with the radius being larger if that enemy is suffering from an ailment of the chosen element. It will avoid choosing the same element twice in a row.
explicitMods: 523 to 971 Added Fire Damage
426 to 792 Added Cold Damage
82 to 1599 Added Lightning Damage

Only Deals Damage of the chosen Element
Deals no Damage of other Damage Types
50% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite
80% more Area Radius against Enemies affected by an Ailment of the chosen Element
10% more Damage per Elemental Ailment on the Enemy
20% increased Effect of non-Damaging Ailments on Enemies
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.typeLine: Startled Divine Life Flask of Sealing
explicitMods: 27% reduced Amount Recovered
Instant Recovery when on Low Life

Grants Immunity to Bleeding for 7 seconds if used while Bleeding
Grants Immunity to Corrupted Blood for 7 seconds if used while affected by Corrupted Blood
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Oblivion Ornament
explicitMods: 1% chance to receive additional Legion items when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
5% chance in Heists for Orbs of Augmentation to drop as Chaos Orbs instead
19% increased Rarity of Items dropped in Heists
items.descrText: You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this

incubatedItem.name: high level Corrupted Gem or Valuable Gem

items.name: Replica Dragonfang's Flight
implicitMods: 24% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
explicitMods: +3 to Level of all Elemental Hit Gems
+14% to all Elemental Resistances
12% increased Reservation Efficiency of Skills
Items and Gems have 13% reduced Attribute Requirements
flavourText: "Did we make this? Why do we have no record of it?
We were warned that there would be consequences..."
